params.proofMaxQuantityForWallet: The maximum number of NFTs an address included in an                                        allowlist can claim.
params.proofs: The proof of the claimer's inclusion in the merkle root allowlist                                        of the claim conditions that apply.
params.quantity: The quantity of NFTs to claim.
params.receiver: The receiver of the NFTs to claim.

claim(address,uint256,bytes32[],uint256).notice: Lets an account claim a given quantity of NFTs.

documentation.text:
Thirdweb's `Airdrop` contracts provide a lightweight and easy to use mechanism
  to drop tokens.
  `AirdropERC721Claimable` contract is an airdrop contract for ERC721 tokens. It follows a
  pull mechanism for transfer of tokens, where allowlisted recipients can claim tokens from
  the contract.
